spec_data.Name: perl-Test-NeedsDisplay
spec_data.Description:
When testing GUI applications, sometimes applications or modules absolutely
insist on a display, even just to load a module without actually showing
any objects.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:53:54 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ensure that tests needing a display have one
